BUG REPORT: Merge Queue API - MR IDs not scoped by workspace.

PROBLEM: PATCH /api/merge-queue/:id finds first MR matching ID across ALL workspaces, not filtered by workspaceId. This caused MR-001 in eval-docportal to update MR-001 from a different workspace (about-page-dev).

IMPACT: Merge queue blocked for 10+ minutes. Agents correctly diagnosed but could not fix.

FIX REQUIRED in orchestrator API:
- GET /api/merge-queue/:id should filter by workspaceId query param
- PATCH /api/merge-queue/:id should require workspaceId in body or query
- DELETE /api/merge-queue/:id same

WORKAROUND: Include workspaceId in PATCH body - this worked.

Filed by: eval-docportal mayor
